name: Receiptor AI 2.0
tagline: Bookkeeping on Autopilot with AI
description: Forget bookkeeping. Receiptor AI finds every receipt past & present, extracts data in context, auto-categorizes your expenses, and syncs to Xero/QBO. AI easily creates rules and manages your documents. Save time, maximize deductions, stay compliant.

name: Google Finance Beta
tagline: Dive into the world of finance with AI-powered insights
description: Ask your toughest finance questions and get AI responses based on real-time market data, news & price updates, and use advanced charting tools to visualize data on-the-fly. Track your favorite asset classes, get quick views on top market movers, and more!

name: fileAI MCP
tagline: Give AI agents secure, real-time access to your files
description: Turn files into usable data instantly. The fileAI MCP server gives AI agents secure access to your files with AI OCR, classification, and schema-based extraction â€” all through the Model Context Protocol.

name: CatDoes
tagline: Team of AI agents build mobile apps for you & your business
description: CatDoes uses a multi-agent approach to build mobile apps for you and your business using AI. It's so easy to use that anyone, regardless of their technical experience, can build a mobile app and publish it on the App Store using CatDoes.

name: Bhava
tagline: Create and edit diagrams instantly with AI
description: Whether you are a PM, engineer or founder, create flowcharts, visuals, cloud architecture diagrams, swimlane diagrams, UML, ERDs, and much more in seconds.

name: Copilot Audio Expressions
tagline: The new voice of your stories
description: Copilot Audio Expressions is a free tool that turns text into expressive audio. Use Emotive Mode to direct your own scripts with custom tone and pace, or Story Mode to have Copilot create a full story with narration. All audio is downloadable as MP3.

name: Upvoted
tagline: Feature voting and product feedback tool
description: Upvoted is your perfect feature voting and product feedback tool. It makes it easy to see which features your customers want the most.

name: Bugster
tagline: AI QA engineer for Next.js apps
description: Run end-to-end tests in real browsers on every Pull Request â€” zero maintenance, instant setup, always up-to-date.

name: Floor796
tagline: Explore a living, animated sci-fi world made of pixel art
description: Floor796 is a huge animated scene full of memes, games, anime, and music references. Explore interactive quests, play games, create pixel art and melodies, post custom ads, and discover countless surprises by clicking around the digital floor.

name: Ghost
tagline: Cursor, Figma, and Powerpoint all in one editor ðŸ”¥
description: Ghost is a GPU-powered, AI-native slide editor that feels as easy as Figma. Built for speed, everything runs smoothly. With Ghost AI, generate anythingâ€”every change stays fully editable: move, tweak, adjust like your own work. Get started free.

name: Coherence X5 for macOS
tagline: Turn websites into isolated Mac apps using Chrome
description: Coherence X5 reimagines site-specific browsers for modern macOS. Create clean, isolated Mac apps from any website using Chrome browsers. The Coherence Extension that makes apps behave like native Mac apps. X5 is faster, smarter, and more seamless than ever.

name: Chronos for Jira
tagline: Time tracking made easy
description: Chronos is a time tracking app for Jira, designed to make managing your daily worklogs simple and intuitive. With features like real-time tracking, manual submission, and support for multiple accounts, Chronos is the perfect companion for your Jira workflow.

name: Guitar Wiz
tagline: All-in-one guitar companion app to learn, practice & create
description: Master guitar chords, practice with professional tools like tuner, metronome & chord assist, and explore songwriting with Guitar Wiz - an all-in-one guitar app designed for iPhone, iPad, and Mac, built with accessibility and musicians in mind.

name: SpatialChat
tagline: Product Feature Update for our Virtual Conferencing Platform
description: ðŸš€ New in SpatialChat Weâ€™re rolling out fresh features to make virtual spaces more engaging than ever â€” from smarter integrations and advanced room controls to richer content sharing.

name: Compot
tagline: SwiftUI components + AI coding assistant
description: Build iOS apps faster. Browse 100+ SwiftUI components and templates to copy, tweak, and paste into Xcode. Generate SwiftUI from text or images, and get AI help to explain, debug, or extend code. No dependenciesâ€”just clean, reusable Swift.

name: NoteWave
tagline: AI-powered transcription & summaries for any meeting
description: NoteWave by Blaze AI Solutions is an AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes meetings in real time. Designed for businesses, it helps teams save time, stay aligned, and never miss what matters most in meetings.

name: OAK
tagline: OAK empowers enterprises with privacy, security, and control
description: OAK is the enterprise AI platform for privacy, security, and control. Empower teams with AI, usage oversight, and data sovereignty. Connect to major LLMs or on-premise LLM hosting with European hosting, max. security, and GDPR compliance.

name: ShareBox
tagline: Effortless secure file sharing for macos
description: ShareBox is a powerful macOS app that lets you securely share files with anyone in seconds. Upload from Finder, generate unique links, and control file access and expiry. Built for privacy, speed, and simplicity.

name: Gromet
tagline: Share and run automations with no installs or setup
description: Gromet lets you turn Python scripts into one-click automations your team can run instantly. No installs, no dependencies, no terminal. Write once, share with a Gromet Vault key, and teammates can run it in seconds.

name: GenAI API for Apple Shortcuts
tagline: Supercharge Appleâ€™s Shortcuts using Cloudflare and Gemini
description: This TypeScript API built with Hono, OpenAI, and deployed as a Cloudflare Worker aims to boost the performance of Apple's Shortcuts by providing a seamless integration with generative AI capabilities, allowing users to create more powerful shortcuts.
